entry.value: # create variables for if switches%%00010if flow_variables['x_design_bool'] == 1:%%00010%%00009flow_variables['x_design_switch'] = 'top'%%00010else:%%00010%%00009flow_variables['x_design_switch'] = 'bottom'%%00010%%00010# create variables for if switches%%00010if flow_variables['y_design_bool'] == 1:%%00010%%00009flow_variables['y_design_switch'] = 'top'%%00010else:%%00010%%00009flow_variables['y_design_switch'] = 'bottom'%%00010%%00010# regex for design group name retrieval%%00010flow_variables['x_regex_design'] = 'PLOT_(.+)_' + flow_variables['merging_x_axis']%%00010flow_variables['y_regex_design'] = 'PLOT_(.+)_' + flow_variables['merging_y_axis']%%00010flow_variables['x_regex'] = flow_variables['x_prefix'] + '(.+)' + flow_variables['x_suffix']%%00010flow_variables['y_regex'] = flow_variables['y_prefix'] + '(.+)' + flow_variables['y_suffix']%%00010%%00010# if axis titles are left empty, fill in default values%%00010if flow_variables['x_title'] == '':%%00010%%00009flow_variables['x_title'] = 'X'%%00010if flow_variables['y_title'] == '':%%00010%%00009flow_variables['y_title'] = 'Y'%%00010%%00010# raise error if no plot type is selected%%00010if flow_variables['plot_type'] == '':%%00010%%00009raise ValueError('No plot type was selected')%%00010%%00010# adjust the plot type variable%%00010plot_type_list = [x for x in flow_variables['plot_type'].split(',')]%%00010%%00010if 'smooth line' in plot_type_list:%%00010%%00009flow_variables['linetype'] = 1%%00010else:%%00010%%00009flow_variables['linetype'] = 0%%00010%%00009%%00010if '95% confidence interval' in plot_type_list:%%00010%%00009flow_variables['show_se'] = 'TRUE'%%00010%%00009plot_type_list.remove('95% confidence interval')%%00010%%00009if 'smooth line' not in plot_type_list:%%00010%%00009%%00009plot_type_list.append('smooth line')%%00010else:%%00010%%00009flow_variables['show_se'] = 'FALSE'%%00010%%00010flow_variables['plot_type'] = ','.join(plot_type_list)%%00010%%00010# plot size%%00010if flow_variables['plot_size'] == '':%%00010%%00009flow_variables['plot_width'] = 800%%00010%%00009flow_variables['plot_height'] = 600%%00010else:%%00010%%00009flow_variables['plot_width'], flow_variables['plot_height'] = flow_variables['plot_size'].split(';')%%00010%%00009flow_variables['plot_width'] = int(flow_variables['plot_width'])%%00010%%00009flow_variables['plot_height'] = int(flow_variables['plot_height'])
